title: Raging Desires
description: Lady Evelyn Sinclaire, is a spirited and determined young lady who knows what she wants or rather whom. She has wanted him since a girl and long ago made a vow to make him hers. Lord Seth Ainsley Marquis of Radcliffe does not see matrimony in his immediate future nor does he see Eve as anything more then his best friend's baby sister... or so he thought... He needs to fight his Raging Desires if only she would stop tempting him...
author: Eryn Louise
